title: Wtf rito??
body:
Ok now, I have been waiting for the new season for a while now. I got silver 5 and was pre happy. Im not that good or anything special but I just finished my provisionals
I won 6 out 10 for my provisionals and was hoping for at least Silver 4 or silver 5.
What I got however was Bronze 3.

I am actually pissed at this system put me here. It makes no sense and Im fucking pissed, it took me ages to get out of bronze last season so I dont want to be back there cause of a broken system.

Rito please explain this as this is stupid.

replies.body: Soft reset, your MMR when you started you placements would have been bronze 2 - bronze 1. It depends on what order you won/lost your games as the biggest MMR changes occur within the first 3 games.
